title: Perform Petrophysical Analysis
description: A petrophysicist analyzes well log data to calculate key reservoir properties like porosity, water saturation, and permeability.

tasks.description: Load the full suite of well logs (gamma ray, density, neutron, resistivity) for the target reservoir interval.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary logs are loaded and quality-controlled.

tasks.description: Calculate the shale volume and porosity of the formation using the neutron-density logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Continuous curves of shale volume and porosity are computed.

tasks.description: Use the Archie equation to calculate water saturation and identify potential hydrocarbon-bearing zones ('net pay').
tasks.expected_outcome: Net pay intervals are identified and flagged based on low water saturation.
